english.segment1: Nothing more. That there's nothing more. Nothing more. That there's nothing more
english.segment2: Nothing here's the same, it's all a dream. Life on the movie screen. And I'm sitting on the edge of my seat
english.segment3: I can't tell what happens next, just what I've seen. I don't know what it means. But I'm holding on the edge of my seat
english.segment4: 'Cause I can't forget your name, forget your name. Yeah I can't forget you now. I know I can't forget you, girl
english.segment5: I promise. Sit back buckle in and hold on tight. A roller coaster ride. And I'm holding on the edge of my seat
english.segment6: And I can't know for sure. 'Cause I just landed on your shore. But I think you got nothing but another thing coming. If you think there's nothing more. That there's nothing more
english.segment7: I can't forget your name, forget your name. Yeah I can't forget you now. I know I can't forget you girl
english.segment8: I can't forget your name, forget your name. Yeah I can't forget you now. I know I can't forget you, can't forget you girl
english.segment9: I can't forget your name, forget your name. Yeah I can't forget you now. I know I can't forget you girl
